metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27740 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Citadel WebCit through 926 allows unauthenticated remote attackers toenumerate valid users within the platform. NOTE: this was reported to thevendor in a publicly archived "Multiple Security Vulnerabilities in WebCit926" thread.

criterions.comment: webcit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
